note:
Progressive Gnostic, neuro-nonconforming, philosophically perverse; pragmatic transhumanist; magnet 4 high wierdness; bastard son of many semens cobbled together by a butcher God.
One part absurdist, one part intensely focused Epicurean philosopher.
When it comes to sex toys and philosophical ideas, my motto is the same: Get weird or go home!
My campy humor is just my way of coping with the fact that I won’t live to see my mind uploaded to some über sexy-androgynous intelligent cyborg!
